name: Rise of a Legend
storyline: As a new Ludus owner in ROAL, you're thrusted into a brutal world where only the strong survive. Forget the tales of heroes and quests; here, your glory is carved from blood and sweat of pure combat. Our game combines intense third-person action fighting with deep management mechanics, offering a singular focus on the visceral thrill of gladiatorial combat.
summary: Rise of a Legend is a third-person action RPG that immerses you in the ruthless era of gladiatorial combat. Engage in rich single-player progression or take on challengers in online multiplayer matches. Manage your Ludus, level up your fighters, and boost your house's prestige with every victory.
